search_results.title: About Sierra
search_results.snippet: Sierra is the author of the forthcoming thriller, THE ENIGMA CHALLENGE (coming 2026 from Viking Penguin), writing as SC Godfrey.

search_results.title: About Sierra by Sierra Simone
search_results.snippet: Sierra is a voracious reader of all things including the smuttiest smut, piles of non-fiction, and old-timey books with brooding widowers.

search_results.title: César Sierra - Spanish & Portuguese - Emory University
search_results.snippet: Biography. Professor Sierra was born and raised in Madrid, Spain. He received his B.A. in Education from the Universidad Autónoma de Madrid in 1988.
